item.name: jt Active Transactions Total Count
item.description: Lists all of the active transactions coordinated by the server or in which server resources participate.

item.name: jt Transaction Rolled BackApp Total Count
jt Transaction Rolled Back Total Count

trigger.name: Hogging Thread is more than {$TRHOG} in {HOST.NAME}

trigger_prototype.name: High connection Failed Reservd Request DS {#JMXNAME} in {HOST.NAME}

item_prototype.name: DS {#JMXNAME} Number of idle DB Connections
DS {#JMXNAME} Number of connections used by applications
DS {#JMXNAME} Waiting For Connection Current Count
DS {#JMXNAME} Waiting For Connection Failure Total
DS {#JMXNAME} Waiting For Connection High Count
DS {#JMXNAME} Waiting For Connection Success Total
JMS {#JMXNAME} Connections Current Count
item_prototype.description: The current number of connections to WebLogic Server server.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} JMS Server Total Count
item_prototype.description: The total number of JMS servers that were deployed on this WebLogic Server instance since this server was started.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} Bytes Current Count
item_prototype.description: The current number of bytes stored on this JMS server. This number does not include the pending bytes.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} Bytes Pageable Current Count
item_prototype.description: Return the total number of bytes in all the messages that are currently available to be paged out, but which have not yet been paged out. The JMS server attempts to keep this number smaller than the "MessageBufferSize" parameter.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} Bytes Pending Count
item_prototype.description: The current number of bytes pending (unacknowledged or uncommitted) stored on this JMS server. Pending bytes are over and above the current number of bytes.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} Bytes Received Count
item_prototype.description: The number of bytes received on this JMS server since the last reset.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} Bytes Threshold Time
item_prototype.description: The amount of time in the threshold condition since the last reset.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} Destinations Current Count
item_prototype.description: The current number of destinations for this JMS server.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} Messages Current Count
item_prototype.description: The current number of messages stored on this JMS server. This number does not include the pending messages.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} Messages Pageable Current Count
item_prototype.description: Return the number of messages that are currently available for paging in this JMS server but have not yet been paged out. Note that due to internal implementation details, this count may be zero even if "PageableByteCurrentCount" is zero.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} Messages Pending Count
item_prototype.description: The current number of messages pending (unacknowledged or uncommitted) stored on this JMS server. Pending messages are over and above the current number of messages.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} Messages Received Count
item_prototype.description: The number of messages received on this destination since the last reset.

item_prototype.name: JMS {#JMXNAME} Messages Threshold Time
item_prototype.description: The amount of time in the threshold condition since the last reset.
